engineIni:
[TURBO_0]
LAG_DN=0.985
LAG_UP=0.9965
MAX_BOOST=1.000
WASTEGATE=0.71

REFERENCE_RPM=3000
GAMMA=5
COCKPIT_ADJUSTABLE=1
turboControllerIni:
[CONTROLLER_0]
INPUT=RPMS ; OVERSTEER_FACTOR REAR_SPEED_RATIO SLIPANGLE_FRONT_AVERAGE SLIPANGLE_FRONT_MAX SLIPANGLE_REAR_AVERAGE SLIPANGLE_REAR_MAX RPMS
COMBINATOR=ADD
LUT=(|0=0.0|2000=0.0|2500=1.2|3500=2.0|)
FILTER=0.99
UP_LIMIT=6000
DOWN_LIMIT=0.0
ersIni:
[HEADER]
VERSION=1

[KINETIC]
CHARGE_K=0.0001
TORQUE_CURVE=(|500=180|5000=180|9000=100|15000=60|15200=0|)
COAST_CURVE=(|500=90|5000=90|9000=50|15000=20|15200=0|)
DISCHARGE_TIME=30000
HAS_BUTTON_OVERRIDE=1
MAX_KJ_PER_LAP=3000
DEFAULT_CONTROLLER=0
BRAKE_REAR_CORRECTION=50

[HEAT]
CHARGE_K=0.001
TORQUE_PERC=20
ersControllerChargingIni:
[HEADER]
NAME=Charging

[CONTROLLER_0]
COMBINATOR=ADD
INPUT=GAS
LUT=(|0=-0.01|0.1=0.0|0.9=0.0|1=1.0|)
FILTER=0.97
UP_LIMIT=1
DOWN_LIMIT=-1

[CONTROLLER_1]
COMBINATOR=ADD
INPUT=BRAKE
LUT=(|0=0|1=0|)
FILTER=0.97
UP_LIMIT=1
DOWN_LIMIT=-1

[CONTROLLER_2]
COMBINATOR=MULT
INPUT=SPEED_KMH
LUT=(|0=0|1=0|)
FILTER=0.97
UP_LIMIT=1
DOWN_LIMIT=-1

[CONTROLLER_3]
COMBINATOR=MULT
INPUT=GEAR
LUT=(|0=0|1=0|)
FILTER=0.97
UP_LIMIT=1
DOWN_LIMIT=0
